name: Manager
text: (Looks like they haven't slept in days.^5.^5.^5)

name: Manager
text: Hello there.^9 Are you doing okay today?

name: Customer
text: I've been up all night trying to get in touch with my family.

name: Manager
text: I'm so sorry.^9 I hope you get through to them very soon.

name: Customer
text: Thanks,^5 but after seeing pictures of the city I don't have much hope l^4e^4f^4t.

name: Manager
text: Stay safe and be well --^5 maybe the National Guard officer outside could help you.
